I'd like to comment that even though I support "Organized free 
form", I will add that I view that choice what it states and some 
additional things I think it should imply. Such as not only will 
there be a few major storylines, but I believe that there should 
also be free-form side storylines - to this I'm sure many would 
agree. I think this lies halfway between "Normal free form" 
and "Organized free form".

--Jeff


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> 
> Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
> nbwrpg group:
> 
> If there was to be a change in the
> format of this RPG, what do you feel
> would be the bestway to go? 
> 
>   o Absolute free-form; no moderator 
>   o Normal Free form; the way it is now 
>   o Organized free form; the council sets and applies major 
storylines 
>   o Fixed form; players have to go in directions given by the 
council 
> 
> 
> To vote, please visit the following web page:
> 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1116559  
> 
> Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
> not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
> web site listed above.
> 
> Thanks!
